item.title: Number 42 South street have left fridges and Building leftovers and rubbish blocking pavement and car parking spaces on the road, 16th September
item.description:

item.title: Leasing / car /cab company, 16th September
item.description:
Hi we are still having trouble with this hire company parking there cars around Herne mews they moved them all only the other day15/09/2025 only for the to replace them with different vehicles as residents we do not have many spaces left when they put so many cars for lease round here pls can we resolve this issue as we have to park round the corner and if and when Tottenham play we now have the issue of parking fines this is not a storage for private company to park they should pay for storage of these vehicles it’s causing absolutely misery on the residents
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Herne Mews, Edmonton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface rutting, 16th September
item.description:
Stoke Newington Common junction with Benthal Road , by bus stop J. The road surface is rutting and created depression that is inconveniencing buses when serving the bus stop. Can this be rectified before it gets worse. Regards

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Common, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Chest of drawers and extra drawers, 16th September
item.description:
The ches has been here for almost 3 weeks and now extra drawers have been added , I saw a rat run out from behind the drawers last night as I came home from work.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotham Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ref previous fix my street ref 8135268, 16th September
item.description:
The problem is the River Cray behind the houses in Riverside Close BR5 3HJ. There is a pump used to pump the water round to the river which runs under the little bridge in Brook Way opposite the shops in Main Road and onto the houses behind Riverside Close and then the river would normally flow down a culvert parallel to Main Road whereby at the the end of the culvert it falls down back into the main river and goes under Main Road next to the industrial estate. Presently the water is so low because it is not being pumped round so the water is not high enough to reach the culvert. The culvert is now smelling. Could somebody look at the river please. The council would know where the pump is located as it has been to attend to it before.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Riverside Close, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very uneven paving stone projecting 30mm, 16th September
item.description:
Uneven paving has been causing puddle for a long time however the paving slabs are now very uneven - projecting 30mm . This is now a serious trip hazzard to pedestrians The paving is between the tree and lamppost outside number 10 Shelbury Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shelbury Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter strewn along st, 16th September
item.description:
Again, this area at the start of Greats Elms Rd is full of dumped rubbish in the gutters from people parking near local shops. Can this area please be cleaned and ideally a littering notification warning / notice added to help stop this happening. Thanks.

item.title: The other day, I reported to you about :"Wet dog on the pavement which is besides a tree that is in front of 95 Fernhead Road"., 16th September
item.description:
The other day I reported to you about :"Wet dog besides a tree that is in front of 95 Fernhead Road". And I also reported to you about :"Wet dog fouling on the pavement which is near the kerb and is in front of 99 Fernhead Road". So far the fouling in both areas has not been cleaned up! The reference numbers are 8163285 and 8168265. Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet
